test_steps:
1. Navigate to upload page
2. Select model file
3. Select train dataset
4. Select test dataset
5. Enter target column
6. Click upload
expected_result: Files upload successfully, redirect to classification stats
test_data: Any valid model and dataset combination

test_steps:
1. Upload model and data
2. Navigate to classification stats
3. Check all metric cards
4. Verify confusion matrix
5. Check ROC curve
expected_result: All metrics display with correct values

test_steps:
1. Navigate to classification stats
2. Locate threshold analysis chart
3. Verify precision-recall curves
4. Check optimal threshold marking
expected_result: Threshold analysis chart displays with interactive elements

test_steps:
1. Click "Explain with AI" button
2. Wait for explanation
3. Verify explanation content
4. Check explanation relevance
expected_result: AI generates relevant explanation of the classification results

test_steps:
1. Open app in different screen sizes
2. Check mobile view
3. Verify chart scaling
4. Test navigation on small screens
expected_result: UI adapts correctly to different screen sizes

test_description: Test error handling for invalid inputs
test_steps:
1. Upload invalid model file
2. Upload mismatched datasets
3. Enter wrong target column
4. Check error messages
expected_result: Clear error messages displayed for all invalid inputs
